title: G-Spot 2: Greed: the 3rd Deadly Sin
description: G-Spot 2: The Seven Deadly Sins is a SERIAL NOVEL TOLD IN 7 PARTS!Pride, Betrayal, GREED, Envy, Lust, Trickery and Revenge!From GREED: The 3rd Deadly Sin!PART THREE OF NOIRE’S BLOCKBUSTER URBAN EROTIC SERIAL TALE!Juicy-Mo is caught in a web of lies and greed!Real friends are hard to come by in the heart of the hood, and when two hundred grand in cash is on the line, even your closest friends might do you dirty!Lured back into the heart of New York City, Juicy faces some harsh realities when the cuffs get slapped on her and she gets thrown in the bing.Will Juicy come out of this with her heart and soul intact? Or will these gut-wrenching acts of greed set her up for even more drama?Find out more in…G-SPOT 2: THE SEVEN DEADLY SINSGreed: The 3RD Deadly SinThe Urban Erotic Serial Saga Continues!From GREED: The 3rd Deadly Sin!WARNING!This here ain’t no romanceIt’s an urban erotic tale,Paper chasers gettin’ doeWhile Juicy’s stuck in jail!Don’t let ’em catch you sleepin’Cause they’re schemin’ for ya stashSticky fingers reachin’In ya pockets for your cash!Even when they’re fat and fullThey want more than they needThey’re plottin’ on your paper tooThis Deadly Sin is GREED!
author: Noire
